content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at Position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0) facing down
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing 81 coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5) moving items from drill to chest

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at Position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0) facing down
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5) facing right

### Smelting Area at Position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0)
- Two burner inserters at (0.5, -1.5) and (2.5, -1.5) facing down

### Transport Belt Network
Complex belt system consisting of multiple connected belt groups:
- Main input belt from iron ore mining area (-17.5, -51.5)
- Multiple interconnected belt sections forming a transport path
- Belt system extends through various positions with multiple direction changes
- Contains some iron ore in transit (10 units)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Belt Placement
- Always check if a tile is occupied before placing a new belt
- Remove existing belts before trying to place new ones at the same position
- Verify the target position is clear using the game's coordinate system

### Errors with Entity Pickup
- Verify the entity exists at the specified coordinates before attempting pickup
- Double check coordinates when trying to pickup transport belts

### Errors with Item Insertion
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to insert them into entities
- Check inventory contents before performing insert operations

### Errors with Entity Connections
- Verify you have required items in inventory before attempting to connect entities
- Plan belt connections carefully to avoid placement conflicts

### General Tips
- Keep track of entity positions and orientations when modifying existing structures
- Remove problematic entities before attempting to place new ones
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices to maintain operation
- Verify space availability in destination containers
